snippet: Violentacrez, the moderator of several highly controversial forums on Reddit, was outed on Gawker and fired from his job, and he will now sit for an interview with CNN.
abstract: Violentacrez, the moderator of several highly controversial forums on Reddit, was outed on Gawker and fired from his job, and he will now sit for an interview with CNN.

headline.main: CNN to Interview Reddit's Violentacrez: A Troll Comes Out From Under the Bridge
